statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , 17 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 24 \, x + 11 , -2 \, x^{3} - 7 \, x^{2} - 7 \, x + 14 , -2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + x - 6 , -5 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 5 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
